mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment (name, buyTime, number, destoryTime, isAppointment,createTime,updateTime) VALUES (#{name} ,#{buyTime} ,#{number} ,#{destoryTime} ,#{isAppointment} ,#{createTime} ,#{updateTime} )

INSERT INTO user_equipment (code, equipmentId, appointTime, returnTime, userId, auditId, overdueTime, state) VALUES (#{code} ,#{equipmentId} ,#{appointTime} ,#{returnTime} ,#{userId} ,#{auditId} ,#{overdueTime} ,#{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_equipment set auditId = #{auditId} , overdueTime = #{overdueTime} , state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ue.*,e.*,au.name auditName from user_equipment ue LEFT join user u on u.id = ue.userId LEFT join user au on au.id = ue.auditId LEFT join equipment e on e.id = ue.equipmentId where u.id = #{userId}
